The Donor Recognition Society honors and recognizes donors for their annual, leadership and scholarship support. Members receive exclusive benefits such as admission and discounted offers to special events, recognition in UIC Business publications and other media, and insider access to the latest news and activities from the college. Below are the membership qualifications for the society’s annual recognition circles and specialized recognition circle.          Donation Levels     Scholar Circle    Recognizes donors who have endowed a scholarship     Dean's Circle     Recognizes an annual leadership gift of $5,000 or more      Leadership Circle     Recognizes an annual leadership gift of $1,000 to $4,999      Loyalty Circle     Recognizes consecutive giving of any amount for two or more years              Alumni           Give to UIC Business    Why I Give    Donor Recognition Society    Student Scholarship Support    Ways to Get Involved    Alumni Leadership Academy    Contact the Office of Advancement
